title: Collection of basic Skyrim mods
description:
THE MOD LIST!
:the Unofficial Patches
:SkyUI
:SKSE
:SSME
:BOSS
:Stable uGridsToLoad
:Better Message Box
:Better Dialogue Controls
:showracemenu PreCache Killer
:Dead Body Collision
:UNP body
:UNP armors
:Guard Dialogue Overhaul
:Immersive Armors
:Interesting NPCs
:Inconsequential NPCs
:xvision children
:Immersive Patrols
:Winter is Coming
:Morrowloot 4E
:Lore Weapon Expansion
:Morrowloot LWE patch
:Run For Your Lives
:When Vampires Attack
:Extended Encounters
:Enhanced Enemy AI
:Enemy AI Overhaul - Revenge of the Enemies
:Brawl Bugs Patch

Extract and place in your /Skyrim Directory NOT your /Skyrim/Data directory
This list requires Dawnguard and Dragonborn.
This list DOES NOT INCLUDE Skyrim.esm, Update.esm, Dawnguard.esm, Hearthfires.esm, Dragonborn.esm, any official DLC, or any other files from a Skyrim install. For that, you have to pay Bethesda.
I've also included BOSS.exe, Wrye Bash in case someone wants to use them, but I've packed in a Bashed Patch anyway so just enabling that should be enough.

After extracting all files run BOSS.exe from your main directory, then go into either Wrye Bash or your Skyrim Launcher -> Data Files, and enable all mod esm and esp. Make sure that Bashed Patch 0.esp is the last in your mod order.
